    Demo

    Demo.Rmd
    library(VancouverOpenData)
library(tidyverse)
#> ── Attaching packages ───────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ──
#> ✔ ggplot2 3.2.1     ✔ purrr   0.3.2
#> ✔ tibble  2.1.3     ✔ dplyr   0.8.3
#> ✔ tidyr   0.8.3     ✔ stringr 1.4.0
#> ✔ readr   1.3.1     ✔ forcats 0.4.0
#> ── Conflicts ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
#> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
#> ✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()

    Get a list of property related datasets

    l <- list_cov_datasets() %>%
  filter(grepl("property",title,ignore.case = TRUE)) %>%
  select(dataset_id,title)
l
#> # A tibble: 8 x 2
#>   dataset_id                        title                            
#>   <chr>                             <chr>                            
#> 1 property-tax-report-2006-2013     Property tax report 2006-2013    
#> 2 property-addresses                Property addresses               
#> 3 property-cadastral-boundaries     Property cadastral boundaries    
#> 4 property-easements                Property easements               
#> 5 property-tie-lines                Property tie lines               
#> 6 property-tax-report               Property tax report              
#> 7 property-use-inspection-districts Property use inspection districts
#> 8 property-parcel-polygons          Property parcel polygons

    Get data for property tax report and property polygons

    tax_data <- get_cov_data(dataset_id = "property-tax-report",where="tax_assessment_year=2019")
#> Downloading data from CoV Open Data portal
property_polygons <- get_cov_data(dataset_id="property-parcel-polygons",format = "geojson")
#> Downloading data from CoV Open Data portal
    plot_data <- property_polygons %>% 
  left_join(tax_data,by=c("tax_coord"="land_coordinate")) %>%
  mutate(rlv=current_land_value/as.numeric(sf::st_area(geometry))) %>%
  mutate(rlvd=cut(rlv,breaks=c(-Inf,1000,2000,3000,4000,5000,7500,10000,Inf),
                  values=c("<$1k","$1k=$2k","$2k=$3k","$3k=$4k","$4k=$5k","$5k=$7.5k","$7.5k=$10k",">$10k"),
                  ordered_result = TRUE))
#> Linking to GEOS 3.6.1, GDAL 2.1.3, PROJ 4.9.3
ggplot(plot_data) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=rlvd),color=NA) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option="magma",na.value="darkgrey") +
  labs(title="2019 relative land values",fill="Value per m^2",caption="CoV Open Data")
